lenders.name: Sparkey
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give

lenders.name: MNP - PSG
lenders.loan_because: Our mom's would be proud

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think people all over the world are doing amazing things and sometimes you just need a few extra funds to meet your goals.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am gifted with a good job, and think it's important to share my good fortune.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus

lenders.name: Mindy-J
lenders.loan_because: my mom asked me to do it as her birthday present one year and I thought it was a great idea!  I love reading the information about the individuals/groups.  To know that we're all helping them make good lives for themselves and their families makes me feel happy.

lenders.name: Ralf
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to think I can help change someone's life for the better.

lenders.name: fayo
lenders.loan_because: I am organizing a programme tagged "COMPUTER LITERACY  BY THE YEAR 2020" in some villages in Nigeria
lenders.occupational_info: i have a cyber cafe and a computer training school

lenders.name: Pamela and Simon

lenders.occupational_info: Pamela - I work in Social Work, Finance

lenders.name: Nancy & Joe
lenders.loan_because: We are happy to loan money to those who are actively trying to make their life better.  Anyone who is willing to work hard and willing to pay back what they borrow seem more likely to succeed.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to be able to make a difference in lives all over the world. I have been blessed with much and it is a great feeling to share some of what God has given me.

lenders.name: Roro
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: FELC Sunday School

lenders.name: Coreen

lenders.name: KRIS
lenders.loan_because: I am in a very fortunate position in my life at 45 yrs old, married for 1 year with a 13 yr old son, I can afford to loan monies to deserving entrepreneurs, I used to be one myself many years ago.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an investment company looking after around 12 offices on a flexible basis.  I also have a travel design company, arranging unusual special interest travel throughout the world.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful that Kiva exists to connect people worldwide and allow me to participate in helping others as I have been helped.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I like to give people encouragement and the resources to succeed in their lives.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much!
lenders.occupational_info: I watch our three children, clean our house, and cook.

lenders.name: Jean-Marie
lenders.loan_because: J'aime me sentir utile.
lenders.occupational_info: J'enseigne les sciences à des jeunes de 18 à 20 ans.

lenders.name: Astrid
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: It's not about me, it's about us......

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and know that a small amount of capital can make a big difference in growing a business.  I believe that energy you put out comes back to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell incense supplies and children's clothing on the Internet and in craft shows.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help people. Somebody once told me that you won't get anywhere in life if you don't help other people get where they want in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a doctor and one day would like to help other countries who need medical help.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I was very fortunate to learn at a young age that true fulfillment does not come from what you have or what you accumulate but instead it comes from what you give back and contribute to the world that has put us where we are. Too often we hurry and rush to get somewhere only to realize we never actually 'get there'. If we always tell our selves we will give back once we 'get there' then it will be too late.
lenders.occupational_info:
I search out ways to teach, help and improve people. This is through reading, writing, speaking and mentoring, among other things. Often the most can be taught and learned through genuine friendship. 

I also seek out the best and most productive businesses in which to invest money so that money can grow to allow me to further contribute.

lenders.name: Ivette
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the wealth and support women around the world. I usually sponser single women with children in Spanish speaking countries.

lenders.name: Arlen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who work hard and want to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I own uses computer controlled machines called WEDM (wire electric discharge machines) to precisely make or modify metal components from raw material stock, such as round bars, square and rectangular bars, sheet and plate.

lenders.name: Ruthe
lenders.loan_because: it's our human connection with other people on planet earth.  We share the world and this is right sharing of resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to someone's story and health concerns and match their symptoms to an energetic remedy made from a plant, animal or mineral.

lenders.name: Lyn

lenders.occupational_info: Our company offers online access to clipart, photos, etc. by subscription. We are donating 10c from every subscription we sell to this program.

lenders.name: MATT & WENDY
lenders.loan_because: WE WANT OTHERS TO GROW AS OUR NEW MARRIAGE GROWS.

lenders.name: Eric T.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others with their endeavours and make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: angela
lenders.loan_because: I was given a kiva gift certificate as a gift.  I loan because it is a good feeling to help others.

lenders.name: Scott Paterson

lenders.occupational_info:

Please join me on Lending Team P2P! http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity

lenders.name: The Osborne Family
lenders.loan_because: this is a win - win situation. My family and I want to make a positive change in our world, and we believe this is just the beginning. This is the system of pay-it-forward and while we help one person they continue to help themselves and others.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to take charge of their lives and make changes for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the little ones how to read and try to show them what an amazing world this place is.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with the most precious resource any country can have, its children. With a proper education a people can raise their standard of living almost without limit, I´m glad I can help my country in such a way.

lenders.name: Judi & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We want to feel connected to the world.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: When I had little more than a good idea and a plan, others loaned to me. By loaning to those in need, I am honoring those who loaned to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build the systems that your ISP uses to provide you with internet access.

lenders.name: Guenther

lenders.name: Boja
lenders.loan_because: ... to share with less fortunate

lenders.name: KIVA HS Osnabrueck
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves to be self sufficient
lenders.occupational_info:
We would like to show friends of ours, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially those from under developed countries. We ask our friends and fellow students for a donation of one cent or a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we collect and transfer it to our Kiva account.

The HS-Osnabrueck Students

lenders.name: Too Cool Girlies
lenders.loan_because: It helps people and we like that!
lenders.occupational_info: We are students and we do chores around our house to earn money to lend to others and buy ice cream!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I have to do something personal to help alleviate suffering in the world. The ability to have a direct relationship with the recipients allows me to know people in very different cultures from my own and makes it harder to thin of anyone as "them."
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to maintaining a private psychology practice I teach workshops on yoga, meditation and spiritual practice in many different countries.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: non-profit sports organization

lenders.name: Dawn & Tim
lenders.loan_because: We love that we can help those that are not in the fortunate position that we are here in the West, but deserve to have the same opportunities and power over their own destiny and lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people to find and know their BLISS in this life.

lenders.name: Dumdum
lenders.loan_because: It is interesting to see people in a very different country doing similar businesses but in a vastly different setting.
lenders.occupational_info: Wine and cheese, coffee and chocolate... life is good!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to show compassion and to make a concrete difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a variety of courses in communication and film.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference on a global level rather than just a local one - plus it's very addictive!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange home loans to help people buy property

lenders.name: OBrien Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe that those who can help have an ethical obligation to do so.  If we can give, we must give.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both licensed social workers and  work as therapists.  We are proud parents of two middle schoolers who help us pick our entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: I live in a very lucky country and have everything and more and these people have so little...wanting to share in some small way
lenders.occupational_info: I live and work in a holiday resort.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: we are teaching our children about helping others, and how even a small amount of money can make an impact in people's lives.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: "it's better to teach someone to fish - than to give them a fish", so assisting people to kick-start their lives is a great idea.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I believe microlending is the best way to alleviate global poverty and I am eager to see firsthand the impact a small loan can make on the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to graduate school for international affairs and would like to work in microfinance afterwards.

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed  to have my family and friends and to live in America. If I can help even one person in a small way by donating then maybe it can lead to others who in turn may help someone else because of the chance they were given.

lenders.name: Matt Vogele
lenders.loan_because: To Give Hope. Help People Everywhere.

lenders.name: Tia
lenders.loan_because: a small loan can make a big difference in a person's life

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: My Lord and savior, Jesus Christ, commands that we love and serve the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the opportunity of giving people a hand up, so they can provide for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Online Marketer  for http://seerinteractive.com

lenders.name: 7 Friends
lenders.loan_because: we can, and want to. There is a saying that goes something like, "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he never goes hungry". We believe it's all about empowering people, and maintaing one's dignity. If our contributions can help then it is our pleasure and joy to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: We are 7  friends who have known each other for many years, we should be ever mindful of our good fortune, give thanks for all we have and give back to help others achieve their best potential.

One day ,I watch TV and I knew Kiva.

this is My wife`s  website.my wife is flutist.

lenders.occupational_info: i am fortunate to simply have to go to school every day

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: God has been very generous to me; it's my turn to be generous to others.

lenders.name: Rowena
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is creative and finance based.

lenders.occupational_info: New operating system that may impact though web 2.0 and 3.0.The details are top classified due to idea copyright and piracy.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: others have helped me along the way and I'd like to pay it forward.

lenders.name: stefan

lenders.occupational_info: As of now Im still in school, i go to class everyday.  But i would like to have job that makes others feel better or lead better lives. I wanna force change, and introduce better lives for the less fortunate.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others

lenders.name: Dorothea

lenders.occupational_info: I am also an entrepreneur, working in the network marketing (direct sales) industry. I work with the Stallone family and other wonderful people in a brand new company called Seriesse. It's exciting, rewarding and the best thing that has ever happened to us!

lenders.name: Kelley

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: it's very important to me to empower women and to encourage argricultural endeavours.
lenders.occupational_info: I create an information link by using communications tools (newsletters, articles, media kits, promotional activities, fact sheets, etc.) to bridge the gap between rural and urban, farmer and non-farmer.

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone has a gift and given the chance, they will flourish.  I have been so blessed in my life and I want to share that abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to do their job to the best of their ability.  I help them use the computer and telephone to help other people enjoy their new toys.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to help big, in a world where we are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides online documentation and communication tools for agencies that serve people with Developmental Disabilities.  I help with training and supporting people that use our services.

lenders.name: ian and margie
lenders.loan_because: it gives me an overwhelming sense of joy and well being and a feeling of being close to someone far away
lenders.occupational_info: margie and i play music for old people that are shut in

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a change for the better in someone's life.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I would like to assist people in opening and growing their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm chief financial officer for a law firm in California

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities for others.

lenders.name: Modern Printed Matter
lenders.loan_because:
I'm a small business owner and want to help other people with theirs.
The concept of KIVA is brilliant.  -Anna
lenders.occupational_info: contemporary greeting cards and stationery products

lenders.name: Jim Dorey
lenders.occupation: I own Internet media & I'm a movie producer.
lenders.loan_because: I am in a good enough position to do so. If the whole world did a similar effort, then clearly we would see a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about the coolest aspect of Hollywood today: 3D movies and entertainment! I also have a cool movie production company that allows me to create what I dream about - can't get better!

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: Help people who needs the money to make or run a buisness to make a decent living.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with refugees i Denmark at asylumcenters.

lenders.name: Jeff & Sonya
lenders.loan_because: As we start our marriage and look forward to building a home and a family, we are eager to lend a hand to struggling families and individuals around the world.

lenders.name: PattyMara
lenders.loan_because: My brilliant son gave me my first gift certificate for Kiva, and I learned how wonderful it feels to connect with other women in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a potter and painter.  I make art that brings a smile and a tear.

lenders.name: Kaye
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy to help someone who needs it. Because it's God's loving directive that we do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young people read and grow into the people they want to be.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel connected to other people.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: people loan me money when I need it

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.occupational_info: knitting the world closer together...

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: we all need to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop medicines.

lenders.name: Rumi
lenders.loan_because: it is easy, effective, and interactive. When I drink coffee, eat chocolate, or travel to a developing country, I think of people who are behind the scene to make all the things possible for me to enjoy.  I want to give something back to them in the most effective way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm interested in conservation and sustainable development. I enjoy trekking in the rainforest.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I hope to increase opportunity for people to succeed and better their communities.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world a little fairer and me a little wiser.
lenders.occupational_info: I run sales teams at exhibtions (fairs) for other companys,

lenders.name: john
lenders.occupation: Manage KUER public radio station in Salt Lake City

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other's by helping themselves to provide a better standard of living.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: There's not enough compassion in the world. The margin of inequality isn't justifiable.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Uschi
lenders.loan_because: I think EVERYONE can afford to lend the amount of 25 $ and you can just GIVE soooo much with this... How often do we spend money for worthless and stupid things that we don't need??? It's so much better to invest it here... I think it gives me much more "interest" knowing that I really helped someone than a bank could ever give me in %. I am really GLAD that I found this page after reading an article in a German magazine!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a secretary and receptionist in a rural hotel on the island of Mallorca.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: our grand parents taught us about giving by the example they set and by their generosity to us. We want to share with others what they have given us. Our grandmother, a widow, age 93 is still an example of caring about others.
lenders.occupational_info: There are 5 of us. We do a variety of things -plumbing,entrepreneurial businesses, insurance and long-term care, and professional soccer.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Our class raised funds to lend on Kiva for an active citizen project.  The hope is to relend the money over the next 2 years when the students move on from this school.
lenders.occupational_info: Science teacher with keen interest in environmental education and social responsiblity.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer of fictions.

lenders.name: Cans For Charity
lenders.loan_because: We raise funds for charities through recycling in the business communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We promote recycling and education in recycling in the business communities, and use proceeds to donate to charities

lenders.name: Ken & Glenda
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings that God has given our family with others who are less fortunate and can use these funds to bless the people of the communities in which they live.

lenders.name: Cheryl & William
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed with abundance-- we want to share with others.  If we can reach out and touch others around the world - we connect to a bigger purpose.  God is good!
lenders.occupational_info: Cheryl works in a nursing home helping to create a home enviroment.  William is a college student.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Pomona College.  I'm studying Environmental Analysis with a minor in Economics.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: God is Love
lenders.occupational_info: I find qualified employees for companies.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: Because what goes around comes around.  I have been fortunate to have been helped by others when I most needed help so now it's my turn and I couldn't be happier to help!!

lenders.name: Kerensa
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It gives the entrepreneur a better livelihood, a community an enhanced economy, and an individual a global perspective.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate. I respect people trying to do better for themselves.  Entrepreneurship has created more prosperity and employment than all the worlds government grants and programs combined.  I consider this a privilege to help fledgling entrepreneurships anywhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Sold my business in 2012. Now consulting.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has to start somewhere & this seems to be a good place to make that start.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference with just $25.00!

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I sincerely want to help people be the best that they can be.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is my dream come true. I travel around the world taking pictures and shooting video to tell conscious visual stories that inspire and awaken. What could be better than making relationships with people to tell their stories that matter?

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: i am able, and helping others in need is awesome!!!
lenders.occupational_info: i work for a store that sells building materials

lenders.name: Alvin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and hope for a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate Strategy & Business Development

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I study chemistry

lenders.name: Luzi
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to start a business!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: of the inspiration of a friend, and our common understanding that every one of us can make a difference in the world.  It's a small world after all :)
lenders.occupational_info:
Day job:  I email and fax Asian vendors with info on documentation and shipping of goods.  
Night job - dream job:  Create with paper!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I am convinced that this way will support people to be independant.  This possibility to show trust in others will bring trust in my life as well.

lenders.name: kaori
lenders.loan_because: I gave birth to the girl last year. I felt honorable of the life more by the child's birth.It was felt that some people wanted to be useful, and reached this site at last.

lenders.name: Chris and Lis
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world. Working at the World Bank one can make a huge difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can mean something for someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a practice as an Organizing- and Life Coach.

lenders.name: sonja
lenders.loan_because: Mein Wunsch ist es die Welt für jemanden, der es nicht so gut getroffen hat wie ich, ein bisschen lebenswerter zu machen

lenders.name: Cynthia, Virginia, USA
lenders.loan_because: I have been given help in my life and as a Christian I want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I verify the credentials of doctors to make sure they are qualified to practice medicine in our hospital.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want the standard of living in all nations to improve and supporting small business is an excellent way of contributing to this.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance editor for television in Australia.

lenders.name: Celine
lenders.loan_because: We all want to better ourselves and our families.  Sometimes we just need a little help.  The men and women shown here are truly amazing, and I am humbled by their success.

lenders.name: Zara
lenders.loan_because: I believe my surplus money can do a lot more good than sitting in a bank.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent my career teaching students, home economics and cooperative education (work place skills).
